name: High Elf
description: High elves are known for their keen intellect and mastery of magic. They often pursue scholarly and arcane endeavors, and their societies are rich with culture and tradition.

High Elf Spells.description: You know the Prestidigitation cantrip. You also always have certain spells prepared and can cast them once per day without expending a spell slot. You can also cast them using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
